title: Cooperstown Welcomes La Russa, Rest Of 2014 Hall Of Famers
teaser: New members are inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame today. Mike Pesca of Slate talks to NPR's Arun Rath about who they are and the Hall of Fame's new induction rules.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
